title: Ticket #2787: [Debian] Missing man pages
description:
In a proper Debian package, all binaries installed in /usr/bin and /usr/sbin need to have a man page. Many of the Condor binaries do not have a man page.

Here is a list of Condor binaries in /usr/bin and /usr/sbin that lack a man page, as reported in the Debian build report for 7.8.0:

  • bin/classad_functional_tester
  • bin/classad_version
  • bin/condor_router_rm
  • bin/condor_test_match
  • bin/condor_userlog_job_counter
  • sbin/condor
  • sbin/condor_c-gahp
  • sbin/condor_c-gahp_worker_thread
  • sbin/condor_collector
  • sbin/condor_credd
  • sbin/condor_gridmanager
  • sbin/condor_gridshell
  • sbin/condor_had
  • sbin/condor_init
  • sbin/condor_negotiator
  • sbin/condor_replication
  • sbin/condor_root_switchboard
  • sbin/condor_schedd
  • sbin/condor_shadow
  • sbin/condor_startd
  • sbin/condor_starter
  • sbin/condor_transferd
  • sbin/condor_vm-gahp
  • sbin/condor_vm-gahp-vmware
  • sbin/condor_vm_vmware
  • sbin/ec2_gahp
  • sbin/gahp_server
  • sbin/gidd_alloc
  • sbin/grid_monitor
  • sbin/nordugrid_gahp
  • sbin/procd_ctl
  • sbin/remote_gahp

In addition, we distribute these binaries in our Red Hat RPMs, but have no man pages for them:

  • bin/condor_drain
  • bin/condor_gather_info
  • sbin/condor_ckpt_server
  • sbin/condor_install
  • sbin/condor_kbdd
  • sbin/condor_shadow.std
  • sbin/condor_starter.std
  • sbin/cream_gahp
  • sbin/deltacloud_gahp
  • sbin/unicore_gahp
remarks:
2012-May-31 10:49:43 by smoler:
Of these lists, we do need a man page for condor_router_rm.

condor_gather_info already has a man page, so time to let packaging folks figure out why the man page isn't showing.

The rest are executables for which they would never be invoked from the command line, so fw might wish to move them to a more appropriate directory, instead of putting in documentation that would be irrelevant.
derived_tickets:

#3024   make condor_router_rm man page
